name: Tracing & Debugging
description: Full trace visualization for nested chains, agents, and tool calls with latency and token tracking.

name: Prompt Management
description: Version control, playground testing, SDK integration for prompt templates.

name: Evaluation Frameworks
description: Model-graded evaluations, human-in-the-loop review, custom scoring functions.

name: Dataset Management
description: Curating, versioning, and splitting datasets for evaluation and fine-tuning.

name: Collaboration
description: Team seats, role-based access control, sharing, and annotation workflows.

name: Pricing & Enterprise
description: Usage-based cost structure, self-hosting options, SOC 2 compliance, and enterprise support.
